scripts.generate-when-method-docs: rm -rf src/content/docs/matching_requests && mkdir -p src/content/docs/matching_requests && node tools/generate-docs.cjs generated/docs.json ./templates/matching_requests src/content/docs/matching_requests
scripts.generate-then-method-docs: rm -rf src/content/docs/mocking_responses && mkdir -p src/content/docs/mocking_responses && node tools/generate-docs.cjs generated/docs.json ./templates/mocking_responses src/content/docs/mocking_responses
scripts.generate-docs: npm run generate-when-method-docs && npm run generate-then-method-docs
